title: 10 Best Samsung RAM For 2023 | Robots.net

Buyer's Guide: Samsung RAM Are you considering purchasing Samsung RAM for your computer or laptop? With Samsung being a reputable brand known for its quality products, it's no wonder you're interested in their RAM options. To help you make a well-informed decision, we have created this comprehensive buyer's guide. Read on to discover all the essential information you need to know about Samsung RAM. Benefits of Samsung RAM - Reliability: Samsung is renowned for producing high-quality electronics, and their RAM modules are no exception. You can trust Samsung to deliver durable and reliable memory solutions for your computing needs. - Performance: Samsung RAM is designed to provide optimal performance, allowing you to run applications smoothly and multitask efficiently. With faster data transfer rates and lower latency, Samsung RAM can enhance the overall speed and responsiveness of your computer. - Compatibility: Samsung RAM modules are compatible with a wide range of computer systems, including both desktops and laptops. Whether you have a Windows or Mac-based device, Samsung RAM can seamlessly integrate into your system. - Warranty: Samsung offers a warranty on their RAM products, providing you with peace of mind. In case of any issues or defects, you can rely on Samsung's customer support to help you resolve the problem. Factors to Consider When choosing the right Samsung RAM for your needs, there are a few key factors to keep in mind: - Capacity: Determine the amount of RAM you require based on your computing needs. Higher capacity RAM modules allow for better multitasking and running memory-intensive applications, but they may not be necessary for basic tasks. - Type: Samsung offers different [types of RAM](https://robots.net/tech/how-many-types-of-ram-are-there/), such as DDR3 and DDR4. Check your computer's [motherboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-motherboard/)specifications to ensure compatibility with the RAM type you choose. - Speed: The speed of RAM, measured in MHz, determines how quickly data can be accessed. Higher MHz values generally result in better performance, but ensure that your motherboard supports the chosen [RAM speed](https://robots.net/tech/how-do-i-know-my-ram-speed/). - Timing: [RAM timing](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-ram-timing-mean/)is denoted by a series of numbers, such as 9-9-9-24. These numbers represent different aspects of how quickly data can be accessed and should be considered when selecting RAM. - Form Factor: Consider the physical size of the RAM module to ensure it fits within your computer. Most desktops use DIMM (Dual In-Line Memory Module) while laptops often require smaller SODIMM (Small Outline Dual In-Line Memory Module) RAM modules. Installation Tips To ensure a smooth installation process, follow these tips: - Shut Down and Disconnect: Before installing any RAM modules, shut down your computer and unplug the power cord. This is crucial for avoiding any potential electrical damage. - Ground Yourself: To prevent static electricity from damaging the RAM or other components, ground yourself by touching a grounded metal object before handling the RAM modules. - Locate [RAM Slots](https://robots.net/tech/how-many-ram-slots/): Locate the RAM slots on your computer's motherboard. Consult your computer's user manual if necessary. - Insert RAM Correctly: Align the RAM module with the slot and firmly press it down until it clicks into place. The notches on the module should align with the notches on the slot. - Test and Restart: Once the RAM is installed, reconnect the power cord, start up your computer, and ensure that it recognizes the new RAM. You can verify this through your operating system or system BIOS. Frequently Asked Questions about 10 Best Samsung RAM For 2023 RAM stands for Random Access Memory, which is a type of computer memory that allows for quick read and write access to data. It provides temporary storage for information that the [CPU](https://robots.net/tech/where-is-cpu/) actively uses. No, Samsung RAM is not limited to Samsung computers. It is compatible with a wide range of computer systems, including those from other manufacturers. However, ensure that the RAM is compatible with your specific motherboard. While it is generally possible to mix RAM modules from different brands, it is advisable to use the same brand and model for optimal compatibility and performance. Mixing different RAM modules may result in compatibility issues or reduced performance. Samsung RAM does not require any additional software or drivers. It should work seamlessly with your existing operating system once installed correctly. The warranty period for Samsung RAM may vary depending on the specific product. Samsung typically offers a limited lifetime warranty on their RAM modules, but it is recommended to check the documentation or contact Samsung for precise warranty details. If you experience slow performance, frequent freezing, or are unable to run multiple applications smoothly, it may be a sign that you need to upgrade your RAM. Additionally, if your computer’s memory usage is consistently high, an upgrade can help improve overall performance. [install RAM](https://robots.net/tech/how-to-install-ram-2/)myself, or do I need professional assistance? [Installing RAM](https://robots.net/tech/after-installing-ram-what-to-do/) is a relatively straightforward process and can be done by most computer users. However, if you are unsure or uncomfortable with performing the installation, it is advisable to seek professional assistance to avoid any potential damage to your computer. In most laptops, the RAM can be upgraded, but it is essential to check your laptop’s specifications and ensure that the RAM is easily accessible for replacement. Some laptops may have soldered RAM that cannot be upgraded. Higher RAM capacity can improve overall performance, especially when running memory-intensive applications or multitasking. However, if you rarely use memory-demanding software or engage in basic tasks, you may not notice a significant difference in performance with higher RAM capacity.

author: theatlantic.com
title: Thai Authorities Raid Bitcoin Mining Farm Over Multi-Million Baht Electricity Theft
text:
Thailand is on a mission to address illegal mining operations causing massive power disruptions in its capital city, Bangkok, and neighboring areas.
In its latest drive against these unregistered operations, the kingdom’s Provincial Electricity Authority (PEA) announced that it has shut down an illegal Bitcoin mining farm in the Phanat Nikhom, District of Chonburi.
Related Reading: UAE Bitcoin Mining Giant Makes Bold Move Into The US Market This time, the energy company worked with the Crime Suppression Division to raid the mining facility, which was suspected of tampering with the electricity meter for crypto-mining purposes.
According to local reports, the PEA and CSD officers confiscated 996 Bitcoin mining machines and similar equipment. A representative of the raiding team said that crypto mining operations work with stolen power worth hundreds of millions of baht.
The persons responsible for the questionable crypto-mining operations are unknown, but the CSD is preparing the necessary arrest warrants from the local court.
Image: The Nation
Illegal Crypto Mining Remains A Problem For Thai Authorities Crypto mining is a complex technical process that requires high-end computers and related equipment. Because it requires massive power and investment in advanced equipment, it isn’t surprising that many groups run illegal crypto-mining operations.
In Thailand, several crypto-mining operations have been set up, and many of these have been illegally tampering with the country’s electrical supply.
BTC is now trading at $91,987. Chart: TradingView Last November 2024, Thai authorities raided and closed at least nine illegal crypto-mining operations and charged two persons with stealing over $280k worth of electricity.
In 2022, Bangkok’s Department of Special Investigation also carried out raids targeting over 50 illegal crypto-mining operations.
Image: The Nation
Chonburi Mining Operator Illegally Tapped Into Local Electricity Supply According to local reports, an unidentified employee of the mining firm tipped the authorities about the possible electricity theft in the facility. Authorities said the facility used the electricity meter correctly daily to avoid suspicions and switch to illegal tapping by night.
Police Maj. Gen. Montree Theskhan of the Crime Suppression Division said the company was registered for digital asset trading. However, it also operated crypto mining rigs that illegally used the state’s power supply at night.
Related Reading: El Salvador Pushes Crypto Forward, Grants Bitfinex Derivatives License The investigations also revealed that solar panels were added to the compound but were not used to power the mining rigs.
Illegal Crypto Mining Operations Also Reported In Other Countries Unregistered Bitcoin mining facilities are also operating in various parts of the world. For example, in its October 2024 report, the Malaysian primary power provider reported over $100 million in losses due to theft.
These illegal crypto-mining activities have pushed national governments to tighten regulations and launch campaigns against violators. Some governments have banned mining and technology outright to control its negative effects.
Featured image from Pexels, chart from TradingView

author: @SamayamM
title: New Orange Alert Districts In Kerala,മഴയാണ് ഇനിയുള്ള ദിവസങ്ങളിൽ; മൂന്നിടത്ത് ഓറഞ്ച് അലേർട്ട്, ഈ ജില്ലകളിൽ യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ട്, അഞ്ച് ദിവസം മഴ തുടരും - orange and yellow alert announced in several districts in kerala amid heavy rainfall - Samayam Malayalam
text:
മഴയാണ് ഇനിയുള്ള ദിവസങ്ങളിൽ; മൂന്നിടത്ത് ഓറഞ്ച് അലേർട്ട്, ഈ ജില്ലകളിൽ യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ട്, അഞ്ച് ദിവസം മഴ തുടരും Authored by ജിബിൻ ജോർജ് | Samayam Malayalam 1 Nov 2024, 2:08 pm Follow Subscribe ഉരുൾപൊട്ടൽ, മണ്ണിടിച്ചിൽ, മലവെള്ളപ്പാച്ചിൽ സാധ്യതയുള്ള പ്രദേശങ്ങളിൽ താമസിക്കുന്നവർ അധികൃതരുടെ നിർദേശാനുസരണം സുരക്ഷിതമായ സ്ഥലങ്ങളിലേക്ക് മാറി താമസിക്കണം. നദിക്കരകൾ, അണക്കെട്ടുകളുടെ കീഴ്പ്രദേശങ്ങൾ എന്നിവിടങ്ങളിൽ താമസിക്കുന്നവരും അപകടസാധ്യത മുൻകൂട്ടി കണ്ട് അധികൃതരുടെ നിർദേശാനുസരണം മാറി താമസിക്കേണ്ടതാണ്. ദുരന്തസാധ്യത പ്രദേശങ്ങളിൽ താമസിക്കുന്നവർ നിർബന്ധമായും തങ്ങളുടെ പ്രദേശത്ത് ക്യാമ്പുകൾ തുറന്നു എന്നുറപ്പാക്കേണ്ടതും പകൽ സമയത്ത് തന്നെ അങ്ങോട്ട് മാറി താമസിക്കേണ്ടതുമാണ്. ഹൈലൈറ്റ്: സംസ്ഥാനത്ത് മഴ ശക്തമാകാൻ സാധ്യത. അഞ്ച് ദിവസം മഴ തുടരുമെന്ന് കേന്ദ്ര കാലാവസ്ഥ വകുപ്പ് അറിയിച്ചു. വിവിധ ജില്ലകളിൽ ഓറഞ്ച് - യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ടുകൾ പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ചു. പ്രതീകാത്മക ചിത്രം തിരുവനന്തപുരം: സംസ്ഥാനത്ത് മഴ ശക്തമാകാൻ സാധ്യത. അഞ്ച് ദിവസം മഴ തുടരുമെന്ന് കേന്ദ്ര കാലാവസ്ഥ വകുപ്പ് അറിയിച്ചു. മഴ മുന്നറിയിപ്പിൻ്റെ പശ്ചാത്തലത്തിൽ വിവിധ ജില്ലകളിൽ ഓറഞ്ച് - യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ടുകൾ പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ചു. പത്തനംതിട്ട, ഇടുക്കി, പാലക്കാട് ജില്ലകളിൽ ഇന്ന് ഓറഞ്ച് അലേർട്ടാണ് നൽകിയിരിക്കുന്നത്. തിരുവനന്തപുരം, കൊല്ലം, കോട്ടയം, എറണാകുളം, തൃശൂർ, മലപ്പുറം, കോഴിക്കോട്, വയനാട് ജില്ലകളിൽ ഇന്ന് യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ടാണ്. കൊച്ചി മോഡൽ ഇനി ഗുജറാത്തിൽ; താപി നദിയിലൂടെ വാട്ടർ മെട്രോ ഓടും, പദ്ധതി പഠിക്കാൻ സുററ്റിൽ നിന്ന് സംഘം കൊച്ചിയിലേക്ക്
സംസ്ഥാനത്ത് വരും ദിവസങ്ങളിൽ മഴ കനക്കാനുള്ള സാധ്യതകളാണ് നിലവിലുള്ളത്. മഴ മുന്നറിയിപ്പിൻ്റെ പശ്ചാത്തലത്തിൽ നാളെ (02/11/2024) തിരുവനന്തപുരം, കൊല്ലം, പത്തനംതിട്ട, കോട്ടയം, എറണാകുളം, ഇടുക്കി, തൃശൂർ, പാലക്കാട് ജില്ലകളിൽ യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ടാണ് പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ചിരിക്കുന്നത്. തിരുവനന്തപുരം, കൊല്ലം, പത്തനംതിട്ട, ഇടുക്കി ജില്ലകളിൽ ഞായറാഴ്ച (03/11/2024) യെല്ലോ അലേർട്ടാണ് കേന്ദ്ര കാലാവസ്ഥ വകുപ്പ് നൽകിയിരിക്കുന്നത്.
കൊടകര കുഴൽപ്പണക്കേസ് എൻഫോഴ്സ്മെന്റ് ഡയറക്ടറേറ്റ് അന്വേഷിക്കണം; എംവി ഗോവിന്ദൻ
ഒറ്റപ്പെട്ട ശക്തമായ മഴയ്ക്കുള്ള സാധ്യതയാണ് ഈ ജില്ലകളിൽ പ്രവചിക്കപ്പെട്ടിരിക്കുന്നത്. സംസ്ഥാനത്തെ എല്ലാ ജില്ലകളിലും മഴയ്ക്കുള്ള സാധ്യതകൾ തുടരുകയാണ്. മഴയുടെ തോത് കുറഞ്ഞ ജില്ലകളിലടക്കം മഴ ശക്തമാകും. മലയോര പ്രദേശങ്ങളിൽ മഴ കനക്കും. ഈ സാഹചര്യത്തിൽ ജാഗ്രതാ നിർദേശം നൽകിയിട്ടുണ്ട്.
കേരള തീരത്ത് ഇന്നും നാളെയും (02/11/2024) മത്സ്യബന്ധനത്തിന് പോകാൻ പാടില്ലെന്നും കർണാടക - ലക്ഷദ്വീപ് തീരത്ത് ഇന്ന് മത്സ്യബന്ധനത്തിന് തടസമില്ലെന്നും കേന്ദ്ര കാലാവസ്ഥ വകുപ്പ് അറിയിച്ചു. ഇന്നും നാളെയും കേരള തീരത്ത് മണിക്കൂറിൽ 35 മുതൽ 45 കിലോമീറ്റർ വരെയും ചില അവസരങ്ങളിൽ മണിക്കൂറിൽ 55 കിലോമീറ്റർ വരെയും വേഗതയിൽ ശക്തമായ കാറ്റിനും മോശം കാലാവസ്ഥയ്ക്കും സാധ്യതയുണ്ട്.
Travel: 'ആറുമണി കഴിഞ്ഞാൽ പണികിട്ടും'; വട്ടവട യാത്രയിൽ ഇക്കാര്യങ്ങൾ ശ്രദ്ധിക്കണം
ഇന്നും നാളെയും തെക്കൻ തമിഴ്നാട് തീരം, കന്യാകുമാരി പ്രദേശം, ഗൾഫ് ഓഫ് മാന്നാർ എന്നിവിടങ്ങളിൽ മണിക്കൂറിൽ 35 മുതൽ 45 കിലോമീറ്റർ വരെയും ചില അവസരങ്ങളിൽ മണിക്കൂറിൽ 55 കിലോമീറ്റർ വരെയും വേഗതയിൽ ശക്തമായ കാറ്റിനും മോശം കാലാവസ്ഥയ്ക്കും സാധ്യതയുണ്ടെന്ന് കേന്ദ്ര കാലാവസ്ഥ വകുപ്പ് അറിയിച്ചു. മേൽപ്പറഞ്ഞ തീയതിയിൽ ഈ പ്രദേശങ്ങളിൽ മത്സ്യബന്ധനത്തിന് പോകുവാൻ പാടുള്ളതല്ല.
Updating... ഓതറിനെ കുറിച്ച് ജിബിൻ ജോർജ് ജിബിൻ ജോർജ്. മലയാളം വിഭാഗം മാധ്യമപ്രവർത്തകൻ. 12 വർഷമായി മാധ്യമ രംഗത്ത് സജീവമായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നു. രാഷ്ട്രീയ - സാമൂഹിക വിഷയങ്ങളിൽ വാർത്തകൾ ചെയ്യുന്നു. ആദ്യഘട്ടത്തിൽ മംഗളത്തിൽ പ്രിൻ്റ് മീഡിയയിൽ ബ്യൂറോയിലും ഡെസ്ക്കിലുമായി പ്രവൃത്തിപരിചയം. 2014 മുതൽ ഓൺലൈൻ ന്യൂസ് വിഭാഗത്തിൽ ജോലി ചെയ്യുന്നു. ഓൺലൈൻ വിഭാഗത്തിൽ വെബ്ദുനിയയിൽ ആയിരുന്നു തുടക്കം. 2019ൽ ടൈംസ് ഓഫ് ഇന്ത്യയുടെ സമയം മലയാളത്തിൻ്റെ ഭാഗമായി. മംഗളം പ്രിൻ്റ് മീഡിയയുടെ ഭാഗമായ ഡിപ്ലോമ കോഴ്സ് (പഞ്ചാബ് ടെക്നിക്കൽ യൂണിവേഴ്സിറ്റി) പാസായി. ഡിഗ്രി ബി.എ പൊളിറ്റിക്കൽ സയൻസ്. ... കൂടുതൽ വായിക്കൂ Follow

author: News Desk
title: Boeing Employees Prepare for Potential Strike Following Pay Agreement Rejection
text:
Table of Contents
Toggle
Boeing Workers Vote Against Pay Rise Deal Implications for Boeing Union Response and Management’s Pleas Overview of the Proposed Agreement Historical Context of Labor Relations Boeing Workers Vote Against Pay Rise Deal
The workforce at Boeing is on the brink of a strike as the employees have turned down a provisional agreement that proposed a 25% increase in pay over four years. This decision impacts over 30,000 employees involved in manufacturing aircraft such as the 737 Max and 777 from facilities located in Seattle and Portland.
Implications for Boeing This strike represents another challenge for Boeing, which is already grappling with significant financial losses amid efforts to rebuild its reputation after several safety incidents, including two deadly accidents. The situation also poses a considerable challenge to the company’s new CEO, Kelly Ortberg, who assumed the role recently with a mandate to revitalize the firm’s operations.
Union Response and Management’s Pleas This week, union leaders recommended that their members ratify the tentative agreement. In a last-minute appeal, Ortberg cautioned that moving forward with a strike could jeopardize Boeing’s recovery trajectory, stressing the potential negative impacts on the company’s future.
Overview of the Proposed Agreement The rejected agreement not only included the substantial pay raise but also contained a provision for Boeing to commit to manufacturing its next commercial aircraft in the Seattle area if the initiative commenced during the contract term. Initially, the union sought greater concessions, including a 40% pay increase.
Historical Context of Labor Relations Boeing’s current contract with its employees was established in 2008 following an eight-week strike. In 2014, the parties agreed to extend this contract, which is set to expire at midnight on Thursday.

author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: Customer's photo of forlorn owner in empty restaurant leads business to boom at OK diner Nick Chappell had never been to Spirals Hot Dogs & More before he took a photo of Scott Hosek in his empty restaurant. But after business boomed, Chappell's part of the Spirals family, Hosek says. [Anthony Robledo](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/7612431001/anthony-robledo/) An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Hosek standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Hosek would soon have no time to stand around as " [Spirals: Hot Dogs & More](https://spiralshotdogs.com/)," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Hosek told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Hosek found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Hosek said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Hosek wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': [See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her](/story/life/humankind/2023/12/26/dolly-parton-meets-longtime-fan/72033945007/) Customer knew he had to capture 'wholesome moment' Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Hosek gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Hosek waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Owner adds new 'Thunderbird' item in customer's honor Hosek is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalapeños, Hosek said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn’t have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Hosek added.

author: Maggie Roth
title: Heman Bekele, Teen Who Developed Cancer-Fighting Soap, Wins Gloria Barron Prize for Young Heroes
text:
Heman Bekele, the 15-year-old from Annandale who invented a bar of soap that fights cancer, added another award to his list of achievements. The
Gloria Barron Prize for Young Heroes named Beleke a winner, earning him an award of $10,000 to support his research.
The Barron Prize, established by author T.A. Barron, honors 25 impactful young leaders ages 8 to 18 per year. Bekele was one of 15 top winners this year.
Bekele developed a bar of soap that helps treat skin cancer, delivering a cancer-fighting drug to the skin to repair damaged cells. The soap costs less than $9 per bar, and it “uses lipid-based nanoparticles to keep the cancer-fighting solution on skin even after the soap is washed off,” according to a news release from the Barron Prize.
Bekele started the research process at age 11, inspired by the lack of affordable health care and high levels of sun exposure that happens to workers in Ethiopia, where he was born and raised.
“This experience has taught me that the possibilities for change are limitless,” Heman said in a news release. “I am just a 14-year-old boy, and yet I now know that my voice can be heard and that with hard work, passion, and perseverance, I can make a difference in the world.”
This isn’t the first time the teen earned national recognition for his invention. In 2023, he became
America’s Top Young Scientist by 3M and Discovery Education — a distinction that came with a $25,000 research grant. He is also Time’s 2024 Kid of the Year.
Bekele is now pursuing Food and Drug Administration certification for his soap and conducting clinical trials on mice. He hopes to continue his research through college and start a nonprofit to distribute the soap around the world by 2028.
“Nothing is more inspiring than stories about heroic people who have truly made a difference to the world,” says T. A. Barron. “And we need our heroes today more than ever. Not celebrities, but heroes – people whose character can inspire us all. That is the purpose of the Barron Prize: to shine the spotlight on these amazing young people so that their stories will inspire others.”
Feature image of Heman Bekele courtesy Gloria Barron Prize for Young Heroes
For more stories like this,
subscribe to Northern Virginia Magazine’s News newsletter.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 低碳ETF易方达（516070）跌0.63%，成交额777.03万元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日，易方达中证内地低碳经济主题ETF（516070）收盘跌0.63%，成交额777.03万元。
低碳ETF易方达（516070）成立于2021年4月15日，基金全称为易方达中证内地低碳经济主题交易型开放式指数证券投资基金，基金简称为易方达中证内地低碳经济主题ETF。该基金管理费率每年0.15%，托管费率每年0.05%。低碳ETF易方达（516070）业绩比较基准为 收益率。
规模方面，截止8月13日，低碳ETF易方达（516070）最新份额为5.30亿份，最新规模为2.51亿元。回顾2024年12月31日，低碳ETF易方达（516070）份额为6.24亿份，规模为2.88亿元。即该基金今年以来份额减少15.07%，规模减少12.86%。
流动性方面，截止8月14日，低碳ETF易方达（516070）近20个交易日累计成交金额1.32亿元，日均成交金额659.10万元；今年以来，150个交易日，累计成交金额9.50亿元，日均成交金额633.39万元。
低碳ETF易方达（516070）现任基金经理为张湛。张湛自2021年4月15日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益-5.32%。
最新定期报告显示，低碳ETF易方达（516070）重仓股包括 宁德时代 、 长江电力 、 阳光电源 、 隆基绿能 、 中国核电 、 三峡能源 、 特变电工 、 亿纬锂能 、 通威股份 、 国投电力 ，持仓占比如下。 股票代码 股票名称 持仓占比 持仓股数（股） 持仓市值（元） 300750 宁德时代 14.83% 14.82万 3738.13万 600900 长江电力 14.54% 121.62万 3665.68万 300274 阳光电源 5.70% 21.19万 1436.32万 601012 隆基绿能 5.28% 88.57万 1330.36万 601985 中国核电 4.45% 120.25万 1120.73万 600905 三峡能源 3.53% 209.10万 890.78万 600089 特变电工 3.49% 73.84万 880.94万 300014 亿纬锂能 3.26% 17.95万 822.47万 600438 通威股份 2.62% 39.47万 661.12万 600886 国投电力 2.05% 35.11万 517.52万

author: Europa Press
title: Iglesias reprocha a Sánchez que priorice más a Sumar que a las "víctimas" de Errejón, cuyas denuncias "ya se hablaban"
text:
Dice que no se alegra del final "siniestro" de quien fuera su "amigo"
MADRID, 24 Oct. (EUROPA PRESS) -
El exvicepresidente del Gobierno y exlíder de Podemos, Pablo Iglesias, ha reprochado al jefe del Ejecutivo, Pedro Sánchez, que se "acuerde más" en redes sociales de su socio Sumar que de las "víctimas" del exdiputado Íñigo Errejón, a la vez que ha señalado que en Madrid ya se hablaba de otra denuncia por una agresión sexista propiciada por el exportavoz parlamentario.
En concreto, Iglesias ha afeado el mensaje de Sánchez donde ha trasladado su "confianza" a la vicepresidenta segunda y ministra de Trabajo, Yolanda Díaz, y a Sumar tras las acusaciones en redes por comportamientos machistas del ya exdiputado del Congreso. En la publicación en X, el presidente del Gobierno ha mostrado su condena "a quienes atentan contra este proyecto de igualdad" y ha mandado su apoyo a las mujeres que sufren acoso y abusos.
El exlíder de Podemos ha destacado la valentía de la periodista Cristina Fallarás por atreverse a abrir "un espacio de seguridad para que las mujeres puedan denunciar cosas que eran muy difíciles de denunciar en este país". Así, ha recordado que ya hubo un mensaje que circuló hace un año entre los periodistas de Madrid donde "una joven denunciaba una agresión en una fiesta en Castellón" por parte de Errejón.
"De esto se hablaba, pero había muchas víctimas que no encontraban un espacio seguro para denunciar", ha reiterado Iglesias en declaraciones en el programa '59 segundos' de TVE, recogidas por Europa Press, donde ha apuntado que no está contento por lo sucedido. "No tenía ni buena opinión personal ni política de Errejón y hace más de cinco años que no hablamos ni compartimos entornos, pero fue mi amigo y no me alegro de que tenga un final tan siniestro", ha confesado.
En este contexto, ha criticado el mensaje de Sánchez hacia su socio de gobierno, recalcando que "lo primero son las víctimas". "Creo que debería escuchar un poco menos a sus amigos cuarentones y cincuentones que no entendían al Ministerio de Igualdad y recordar que gracias a la ley 'sólo si es sí', del anterior Ministerio de Igualdad, hoy cualquier mujer, sin necesidad de una sentencia judicial, tiene la consideración de víctima", ha rememorado.
Por último, y preguntado por si había detectado este tipo de comportamiento machista en Errejón, el exlíder de Podemos lo ha descartado. "Es verdad que yo llevo más de cinco años sin tratar con él, había escuchado cosas sobre todo después del último año, pero cuando yo le conocí no era así", ha zanjado.
Leer más acerca de: Pedro Sánchez Pablo Iglesias Íñigo Errejón Podemos Sumar
